name: Light Link
description:
Light Link is an arcade style bullet hell about navigating a composite light entity through deep space. 

Gather light energy, fuel your Light Link, and dodge dangerous radiation!

How far can you go?

Controls:

Light Orbs each come with their own unique power, that can be used by expending some of their energy.

The Blue Orb has the power to destroy energy. Its power clears an area of radiation bursts

"D": controls your Blue Orbs power up Boom

The Orange Orb has the power to slow radiation 

"S": controls your Orange Orbs powerup Slow

The Purple Orb can transfer its energy into other orbs in its link.

"A": controls your Purple Orbs powerup Heal

"Space": Pauses the game
